extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    MUSC 273/3.0 and MUSC 274/3.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from MUSC 233/3.0; MUSC 333/3.0.

basic.description: An historical overview and introduction to the philosophical and pedagogical views of Emile Jaques-Dalcroze, Zoltan Kodály and Carl Orff to teaching music.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Dalcroze  Kodaly and Orff
